welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Brie-Comte-Robert, a charming city known for its historic buildings, delicious cheese, and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to discover all the beauty this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Le Bourget Airport caters to private and business jet flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for the first 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals (2A-2G) serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but it may require reconnection every 15 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern facilities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
